title: This is London
creator_credit: Jo Jago, Howard Thomas and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: Rex Harrison conducts us on a tour of the most interesting and exciting city in the world; showing places and events of interest to the overseas visitor, which give an attractive picture of the city’s pageantry, people and life.
creator_credit_for_label: Jo Jago, Howard Thomas and Associated British-Pathe
